general_info.summary: This text appears to be a sitemap or navigation structure for a university website (NIU). It lists various sections such as Careers, University Authorities, Committees, various policies (HR, CRS, Transport, Scholarship, Hostel, Fee Payment, Migration, Sports), Ordinances, Statutes, Acts, financial documents (Balance Sheet), information about the university (About NIU, Leadership, Recognitions, Awards, Collaborations), specific reports (IQAC Annual Reports, NISP 2019), and details about placements and alumni. It also includes a link to "Apply Now 2025" and information regarding COVID-19, with the source URL provided.

admission_requirements.summary: This document outlines the CUET Counselling process for the 2025-26 academic year, including application deadlines, counseling dates and venue, and required documents. Key information covers applying for counselling, the admission process, courses and fees, scholarships, transport, hostels, and admission alerts. The deadline for online applications is July 15th, 2025, with the first round of counseling on July 16th, 2025, at the Noida International University Campus. Admissions are based on merit and a first-come, first-served basis. Required documents include 10th and 12th mark sheets and certificates, Aadhar card photocopy, passport-sized photographs, and the CUET scorecard.

• It is mandatory to fill online application form to participate in CUET Counselling
• Last Date of filling the online application form for CUET counselling is 15th July’25
• Kindly fill in your online application form by clicking on https://niu.edu.in/leading-university-of-india/
• First Round of CUET Counselling is 16th July’25, Venue – Noida International University Campus
• Admissions are subject to merit & first come first serve basis.

feedback.summary: This document lists various categories of feedback related to a university's curriculum, teachers, and overall student experience.
